page.title: 05**** GAMES AND RHYMES ****
page.content: {************************************** {Here are some of the rhymes we use to {choose people for games,to skip to and {to bounce balls to. {Two baller:-}Want a cup of tea sir?-No sir-Why sir?-Cause I got a cold sir-Whered'you get the cold sir?-From the North Pole sir-What were you doing there sir?-Catching a polar bear sir- How many did you catch sir?-1-2-3 {Skipping:-}I'm a little Brownie girl all dressed in brown. These are the actions I must do. Salute to the captain, curtsey to the Queen. Show your knickers to the football team. {Choosing:-}Inky pinky ponky.Daddy bought a donkey. Donkey died, Mammy cried. Inky pinky ponky. Old Mrs Betty-Hole fell down the Netty-Hole. How many miles did she fall? {**************************************
